transcript:
The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later. Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, veh abhi dusri call pe vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha kare ya kuch samay baad call kare.
The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later. Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, veh abhi dusri call pe vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha kare ya kuch
Hello.
[inaudible]
Hello.
Hello.
Hanji. Hanji Alin International mein baat ho rahi hai.
Hanji, kaun bol rahe hain, kahan se bol rahe hain? Ji sir, good afternoon, main Pallavi baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se.
Hanji bataiye. Aap kaun sir rahe the sir, hamare customer care mein?
Han, customer care mein call kar raha hun main. Ji ji ji bataiye.
Mujhe apna paisa return chahiye.
Sir return ke liye to I think maine bhi abhi tak abhi tak return hua nahi, main ek hafte se baat kar raha hun. Mera association cancel bhi kar diya.
Kisi ne aapko confirm kiya ki return ho jayega? Kisi ne nahi kiya confirm aapko? Bilkul hoga na, hoga kaise nahi hoga? Sir kisne bola hai aapko? Kisi ne aapne char logon se baat kar li hai. Customer care number pe baat kijiye mujhse. Kisne likh kar ke aaya hai? Customer ke personal number se kyun aap call kar rahe ho mujhe?
Sorry sir, kya keh rahe hain?
Customer care number se call karo na mujhe. Ye apne personal number se mujhe kyun call kar rahe ho aap?
Sir, to aapne IndiaMART mein phone kiya hai na, to main IndiaMART ki employee baat kar rahi hun. Customer care jo customer care number pe kyun nahi baat kar rahe ho aap log?
Dusre number se kyun baat kar rahe ho? Us din bhi ek aadmi kaha ki main manager hun, main baat kar raha hun, main aapka kaam kara dunga.
Sir customer care number aapke liye hota hai. Aap call kar sakte hain. Usme jo bhi representative available hoga, wo aapka phone uthayega. Thik hai? To mere to wo to keh rahi ki main to abhi apne ghar pe hun, chutti mein hun. Customer care number kya uska personal hai kya?
Sir, aapne call kiya hai. Aapka jo call hai, pehle aapke account manager ko divert hota hai. Aapke account manager Hanshika hai. Hanshika ne phone uthaya hai. Wo available nahi hai aaj. Thik hai? Ab aapka customer care hamare paas request aaya hai. To maine aapko call back kiya hai. Han to mera paisa return karwa do aap bhai. Thik hai. Sir hum to aapko kai baar bata chuke hain ki sir return. Nahi aapke batane se nahi hota hai na. Hamare kai logon ka wapas ho chuka hai. To lekin sir aapki zid karne se bhi nahi banegi na baat. Banegi madam banegi. Bahut logon ki ban gayi hai, isliye banegi baat.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund.

- Questions why executive called from personal number.



Resolution:

- Explained the call was diverted from account manager.

- Executive stated that they have received request.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. No follow-up provided.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, customer care, account manager
